attributes.action: Close down the Potion bar in erith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every weekend there are fights, loud music, very loud foul language, and broken glass on the streets outside. The police are called every weekend which i am sure is a drain on valuable police resources, This lasts from approx 9pm to 3am every friday and saturday in this residential area which is home to many young familys and elderly residents.

rejection.details: Please contact your local council or police.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
